data.eml:eml: A new species of Paratanais Dana, 1852 (Crustacea, Peracarida, Tanaidacea, Paratanaidae) from Puerto Rico, northwestern Atlantic

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Morales-Nunez, Andres G., Heard, Richard W. (2014): A new species of Paratanais Dana, 1852 (Crustacea, Peracarida, Tanaidacea, Paratanaidae) from Puerto Rico, northwestern Atlantic. ZooKeys 397: 49-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.397.6137, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.397.6137
